name: Celebration at Theo's
description:
Celebration at Theo's (aka C.A.T.)  is a cute little stealth platformer where you collect all the items in preparation for your party!

Your parents decided to go see a drive-in movie, leaving you to yourself (finally!) 

Looks like tonight we're having a party!

Collect the items around the house and store then in your cat bed before the timer ends and the night comes. Avoid your parents as you sneak under tables and jump high on shelves. 

Will you be able to collect all the items and have the greatest cat celebration ever?

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right - Left and right
W or Up - Jump and move to different room
S or Down - Peek into the previous room
Space - Interact / Meow

Thanks for playing!
